title: The Collected Stories of Philip K. Dick (5 ePUB and bonus)
description:
The Collected Stories of Philip K. Dick (5 ePUB and bonus)

NOTE: The previous torrent had one volume duplicated with a cover substitution 
and another missing the cover. I found a different source.

The Collected Stories of Philip K. Dick is a collection of science fiction 
stories by Philip K. Dick. It was first published by Underwood-Miller in 1987 as 
a five volume set. See Philip K. Dick bibliography for information about the 
mass market reprints.

The actual titles of the volumes have changed as stories were added. These are 
the titles as published by Citadel Twilight in 1990-1992. See 
[url]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philip_K._Dick_bibliography#Comparison_of_editions[/url]
 for more information.

Many of the stories had originally appeared in the magazines Fantasy and Science 
Fiction, Planet Stories, If, Galaxy Science Fiction, Imagination, Space Science 
Fiction, Fantastic Story Magazine, Amazing Stories, Future, Cosmos, Fantasy 
Fiction, Beyond Fantasy Fiction, Thrilling Wonder Stories, Startling Stories, 
Fantastic Universe, Science Fiction Quarterly, Astounding, Science Fiction 
Adventures, Science Fiction Stories, Orbit, Satellite, Imaginative Tales, 
Fantastic, Worlds of Tomorrow, Escapade, Famous Science Fiction, Niekas, Rolling 
Stone College Papers, Interzone, Playboy, Omni and The Yuba City High Times. 
Contents

The set was published in four states:

    3 copies were quarterbound in calfskin with a handmade slipcase and the author's signature tipped in.
    100 copies were bound in red buckram, slipcased, with the author's signature taken from his canceled checks, laid in.
    405 copies were bound in tan and brown cloth, slipcased, but without signature. (400 of these are numbered from 101-500 and 5 are presentation copies.)
    800 copies were bound with a yellow-orange binding and did not have a slipcase.

The volumes were not sold individually. All sets except the trade edition (800 
copies) also included a chapbook, "Brief Synopsis for An Alternate World Novel: 
The Acts of Paul, an outline for a novel that was never written.
This is included seperately.

-wikipedia [url}http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Collected_Stories_of_Philip_K._Dick[/url]


[b]The Acts of Paul, Brief Synopsis for Alternate World Novel - Philip K. Dick. (ePUB)[/b]


[i]The Philip K. Dick Trust is excited to present these rare, unpublished writings from Philip K. Dick. 
The Acts of Paul, Brief Synopsis for Alternate World Novel by Philip K. Dick.

This is a rare 2-page treatment for a novel written by Philip K. Dick in 1982 
and recently rediscovered by his agent, Russell Galen. This treatment was 
released as an insert for 400 limited-edition novels, but has not been published 
elsewhere.
[/i]


This was left out of my original PKD Collected Stories torrent.
 
-amontoth
